name: Kontrollverlust
text: Gib dies dem Spieler von Monica Rambeau. Du kannst die Energiegestalt nicht wechseln. Alter-Ego Aktion: Erschöpfe Monica Rambeau → entferne Kontrollverlust aus dem Spiel.

name: Radioactive Man
text:
[star] Erzwungene Reaktion: Nachdem Radioactive Man gegen dich aktiviert worden ist, füge jedem Charakter unter deiner Kontrolle 1 Schaden zu.
[star] Boost: Füge jedem Charakter unter deiner Kontrolle 1 Schaden zu.

flavor: Radioactive Man nutzt seine Kraft, um einen Atomreaktor zu überlasten!
name: Kernschmelze
text: Sobald besiegt: Füge jedem befreundeten Charakter im Spiel 1 Schaden zu.

name: Kräfte aufzehren
text: Hänge diese Karte an deine Identität an. Erzwungene Reaktion:Nachdem dein Zug beendet ist, nimm 1 Schaden. Alter-Ego Aktion: Gib [energy][energy] Ressourcen aus → lege diese Karte ab.

flavor: "Du kannst diesen Kampf nicht gewinnen." -- Radioactive Man
name: Radioactive Explosion
text: Sobald aufgedeckt (Alter-Ego): Platziere 2 Bedrohung auf dem Hauptplan. Sobald aufgedeckt (Held): Nimm 2 Schaden.

name: Regenerationszyklus
text: Gib diese Karte dem Spieler von Adam Warlock. Du darfst deine Identität auf deine Alter-Ego-Seite umdrehen. Wähle eines: -Erschöpfe dein Alter Ego → entferne diese Verpflichtung aus dem Spiel. -Lege die obersten 5 Karten deines Decks ab. Platziere für jeden auf diese Weise abgelegten unterschiedlichen Aspekt 1 Bedrohung auf dem Hauptplan. Lege diese Verpflichtung ab.

name: Magus
text: Erstschlag. Zähigkeit. [star] Erzwungene Reaktion: Nachdem Magus gegen dich aktiviert worden ist, lege die obersten 5 Karten deines Decks ab.

name: Kirche der universellen Wahrheit
text:
Erzwungene Reaktion: Nachdem ein Spieler sein Deck zurückgesetzt hat, erschöpfe die Identität des Spielers und betäube sie.
[star] Boost: Decke diese Karte auf.

name: Zealot der Wahrheit
text:
Vom Nebenplan Kirche der universellen Wahrheit kann keine Bedrohung entfernt werden.
[star] Boost: Bringe Zelot der Wahrheit mit dir im Kampf ins Spiel.

name: Kosmische Inquisition
text: Anstacheln 2. Sobald aufgedeckt: Falls der Nebenplan Kirche der universellen Wahrheit im Spiel ist, lege die obersten 10 Karten deines Decks ab. Durchsuche ansonsten das Begegnungsdeck, den Ablagestapel und die beiseitegelegten Karten nach der Kirche der universellen Wahrheit und decke sie auf. Mische das Begegnungsdeck.

flavor: "Your powers are quaint. Let me show you real magic."
name: Ebony Maw
text: [star]Forced Interrupt: When Ebony Maw activates against you, remove an invocation counter from each [[Spell]] card in your play area.

name: Ebony Maw
text: [star]Forced Interrupt: When Ebony Maw activates against you, remove an invocation counter from each [[Spell]] card in your play area. When Revealed: Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a [[Spell]] card and puts that card into play in their play area.

name: Ebony Maw
text: [star]Forced Interrupt: When Ebony Maw activates against you, remove an invocation counter from each [[Spell]] card in your play area. When Revealed: Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a [[Spell]] card and puts that card into play in their play area.

back_text: Contents: Ebony Maw (I) and Ebony Maw (II). (Ebony Maw (II) and Ebony Maw (III) instead for expert mode.) Ebony Maw and Standard encounter sets. Two modular encounter set (Armies of Titan and Black Order).
name: Attack on Knowhere
text: When Revealed: Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a [[Spell]] card and puts that card into play in their play area. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

back_text: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a [[Spell]] card and puts that card into play in their play area.
flavor: Ebony Maw uses his powerful magic to occupy you while his agents search for the Power Stone.
name: The Power Stone
text: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Fireball
text: Surge. Enters play with 4 invocation counters on it. Forced Response: After the last invocation counter is removed from Fireball, discard it → deal 4 damage to your identity.

name: Manipulation
text: Surge. Enters play with 2 invocation counters on it. Forced Response: After the last invocation counter is removed from Manipulation, discard it → discard 1 card at random from your hand. You are confused.

name: Pacification
text: Surge. Enters play with 3 invocation counters on it. Forced Response: After the last invocation counter is removed from Pacification, discard it → exhaust each upgrade you control. You are stunned.

name: Rubblestorm
text: Surge. Enters play with 3 invocation counters on it. Forced Response: After the last invocation counter is removed from Rubblestorm, discard it → deal 2 damage to each character you control.

name: Agent of Thanos
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each [[Spell]] environment in your play area. If you place no threat this way, this card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Deal 1 damage to your hero for each [[Spell]] environment in your play area. If you take no damage this way, this card gains surge.

name: Channeling Trance
text: When Revealed: Remove 1 invocation counter from each [[Spell]] environment in your play area. If you have no [[Spell]] environments in your play area, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Spell]] environment is discarded. Put that card into play in your play area.

name: Abjuration
text: Attach to Ebony Maw. Prevent all damage to Ebony Maw. Forced Response: After Abjuration prevents 2 or more damage from a single attack, discard it.

flavor: "Shh. That's enough from you." - Ebony Maw
name: Restrained
text: Attach to a friendly character with the highest ATK and exhaust it. Attached character cannot ready. Hero Action: Spend [energy][physical] resources → discard this card.

flavor: The Maw's troops have stormed Knowhere's engine room and set the station to overload.
name: Reactor Overload
text: When Revealed: Each player must choose to either take 2 damage or place 2 threat here.

name: City Under Attack
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]

name: Sanctuary
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]

name: Gnipahellir
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]

name: Hall of Nastrond
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]

name: Gjallerbru
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]

name: Casket of Ancient Winters
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]

name: War in Asgard
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]

name: Madness on Midgard
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]
